burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa

Interface StateToFeatureVectorGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcatenatedObjectFeatureVectorGenerator, FDFeatureVectorGenerator, PFFeatureVectorGenerator

    public interface StateToFeatureVectorGenerator
    Many functions approximation techniques require a fixed feature vector to work and in many cases, using abstract features from the state attributes is useful. This interface provides a means to take a BURLAP OO-MDP state and transform it into a feature vector represented as a double array so that these function approximation techniques may be used.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] generateFeatureVectorFrom(State s)
      Returns a feature vector represented as a double array for a given input state.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        s - the input state to turn into a feature vector.
        Returns:
        the feature vector represented as a double array.
